channel.title: hexo on LookForAdmin的博客
channel.description: Recent content in hexo on LookForAdmin的博客

item.title: hexo更改post模板
item.description: 运行hexo new post时,现在的模板是 1 2 3 4 5 --- title: {{ title }} date: {{ date }} tags: --- 默认无分类 在scaffolds更改post.md --- title: {{ title }} date: {{ date }} tags: categories: --- 就好了
